alert.note: Alert for Mercer (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:58PM CDT until September 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MORTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL MERCER COUNTIES... At 658 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Hebron, or 20 miles south of Beulah, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Morton and south central Mercer Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
